title: Arbitrage transactions not affected
context: ยง431:4-212 Arbitrage transactions not affected. Section 431:4-208 to section 431:4-210 shall not apply to foreign or domestic arbitrage transactions unless made in contravention of such rules and regulations as the commissioner may adopt in order to carry out the purposes of section 431:4-208 to section 431:4-214. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
